jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
Hiperpool is the leading career platform for the strategy, consulting and M&A community.

Launched in 2015 by two former strategy consultants, we're a tech startup based in London and active across all major business hubs, with a strong presence in the US, UK and Germany.

Our mission is to empower professionals to achieve their career goals and employers to fulfill their vision.

**About the Role:**

As a Business Development Manager, you will be responsible for bringing new employers to the platform and ensuring that they have a successful and high-quality experience. You will be working with companies from different industries and sizes, from up-and-coming startups to household names.

This is a multifaceted role, which requires regular interfacing with the Marketing, Talent and Product teams to ensure our clients get the best possible experience.

**Responsibilities:**
- Map the market to identify potential clients
- Develop, execute, and refine our client acquisition strategy
- Inspire and educate prospective clients on the value of our service versus traditional recruiting channels 
- Maintain active engagement with new and existing clients
- Work with the Talent team to ensure that clients are being matched with the right candidates

- Partner with the Marketing team to generate inbound leads
- Provide feedback to the Product team to improve the client experience

**Requirements**

- ~2-5 years of experience working in business development, management consulting or similar analytical and client-facing roles
- Enthusiasm to join an early-stage company and help build a game-changing business
- Knowledge of the management consulting and/or investment banking landscape
- Excellent communication skills
- A self-starter who takes the initiative to get things done
- High attention to detail, with a process and solution-oriented mindset
- A team player who will put the growth of the company first
- Some recruitment experience would be ideal

**Benefits**

- Competitive Salary
- Fun WeWork office in Victoria
- Team lunch and social drinks every Friday
- Weekly football and daily table tennis!

jobs.title: Talent Sponsor
jobs.description:
Hiperpool is the leading career platform for the top-tier business community. We connect exceptional talent with brands such as Airbnb, Bain & Co and BT.

We’re a high-growth HR tech startup headquartered in London and active across the major business hubs globally.

We are on a mission to empower professionals to achieve their long-term career goals and employers to find the talent to fulfill their vision.

### THE ROLE:

The Talent Sponsor is central to our success in building and growing an engaged community of top-tier professionals.

You work to attract new members to the platform, match them to the right opportunities, and guide them in their recruitment journey and career choices. You are the expert that our members can lean on.

You will support in building our startup and technology by improving Hiperpool's product and processes. Help us build a category-defining business.

Early on you will manage and provide guidance to more junior team members as applicable.

You can find more details on the role from one of our founders here: [link](https://workable.com/nr?l=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fpulse%2Fbecome-hiperpool-talent-sponsor-help-us-redefine-antonio-leone%2F)

### CAREER PROGRESSION:

Given our growth trajectory, the future of the role is limitless (lead a market, lead a vertical, etc) so we’re looking for people that can hone their current skills and craft new ones to become the future leaders of the company.

### HOW YOU WILL MAKE AN IMPACT:

- Provide guidance, gather feedback and move interview processes forward -- you will become an expert in top-tier business roles and careers 
- Identify employers’ hiring needs and manage hiring priorities along with the Client team
- Match Hiperpool members to job opportunities based on their experience and career goals
- Manage and track a high volume of hiring processes at the same time
- Partner with the Marketing team to ensure our member base is engaged and growing
- Provide feedback to the Product team to improve user experience

### WHAT WE LOOK FOR:

- ~0-3 years of experience in recruitment, sales, HR, community management or similar (recent graduates will also be considered)
- BS/BA degree or equivalent from a reputable university as a minimum
- Excellent communication, organisational and interpersonal skills
- Enthusiasm to join an early-stage company
- A self-starter who takes the initiative to get things done
- High attention to detail, with a process and solution-oriented mindset
- A team player 
- Knowledge of the management consulting, corporate strategy and/or investment banking landscape a plus

### COMP, BENEFITS & PERKS:

- Competitive base depending on experience + uncapped bonus
- Work directly with the founders
- Work at WeWork Victoria with perks such as on-site barista, beer/prosecco taps, Yoga Wednesdays...
- Mobile phone reimbursement
- Daily table tennis matches and weekly football games
- Weekly team lunch and drinks social
- Team days out

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Associate
jobs.description:
Hiperpool is the leading career platform for the top-tier business community. We connect exceptional talent with brands such as Airbnb, Bain & Co and BT.

Founded in 2015, we’re a high-growth tech startup headquartered in London and active across the major global business hubs. 

Hiperpool is on a mission to empower professionals to achieve their long-term career goals and employers to find the talent to fulfill their vision.

THE ROLE:
You will be responsible for helping design and execute Hiperpool’s social media and content marketing strategy.

Your main objectives, to begin with, will be to research, write and promote shareable content across social media channels; and grow our social media presence. To achieve your objectives, you will have to be creative and use a variety of channels.

This role will develop as you settle in, expanding into a variety of marketing channels (e.g. PR, communications, partnerships, etc).

You will report to the Content and Digital Marketing Manager, as well as the Founding team and will be based in Victoria, London, UK.

HOW YOU WILL MAKE AN IMPACT:
- Help design and implement Hiperpool’s social media and content marketing strategy
- Help manage content creation efforts and help turn Hiperpool into an industry thought leader
- Help manage our social media presence
- Identify KPIs, set targets and analyse results
- Help drive member engagement and new sign-ups through a variety of channels

WHAT WE LOOK FOR:
- BS/BA degree or equivalent from a reputable university as a minimum; MA/MS a plus
- Minimum achieved grade 2:1 or equivalent
- Experience in social media, marketing, growth, PR or communications
- Excellent communication and writing skills
- Strong organizational skills
- A self-starter who takes the initiative to get things done

COMP, BENEFITS & PERKS:
- Competitive salary
- Work directly with the founders
- Work at WeWork Victoria with perks such as on-site barista, beer/prosecco taps, Yoga Wednesdays...
- Weekly drinks social
- Team days out
